text: Conan Lee Gray (born December 5, 1998) is an American singer and songwriter. He was born in Lemon Grove, California and raised in Georgetown, Texas. He started as a YouTuber when he was a teenager. He signed to Republic Records in 2018. == Early life == Conan Lee Gray was born on December 5, 1998, in Lemon Grove, California. When he was a baby, he moved to Hiroshima, Japan because his grandfather had cancer. After his grandfather died, he moved back to California. Gray moved to Georgetown, Texas when he was a preteen. A lot of his music is inspired by it. == Career == Conan Gray started making YouTube videos when he was 15. He released his first song in 2017, called "Idle Town". In 2018, he released an extended play called Sunset Season. In 2020, Conan Gray released his first album, Kid Krow. It was the most popular debut of the year. His second album, Superache, came out in 2022. His third album, Found Heaven, came out in 2024. == Discography == === Studio albums === * Kid Krow (2020) * Superache (2022) * Found Heaven (2024) === Extended plays === Extended plays: * Sunset Season (2017) == Tours == * Sunset Shows (2018–19) * Comfort Crowd Tour (2019) * Conan Gray World Tour 2022 * Superache Tour (2022–23) * Found Heaven On Tour (2024) == References == == Other websites == * * * Conan Gray's Fans Had Front Row Seat To His Path To Rising Star – Documentary by Uproxx and Honda Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American singer-songwriters Category:American YouTubers Category:Singer-songwriters from Texas Category:Singer-songwriters from California
title: Conan Gray
